circumstances: Mohammad Arnold, known to have a keen interest in a hermit lifestyle, was reported missing from his residence on Caledonian Road, Perth, PH1 5XD. He had not collected his essential medications, raising concerns for his health and well-being. Family members, including his brother, noted that prior to his disappearance, he expressed plans to explore a coastal area renowned for sea kayaking. Concern grew when no trace of him was found at 10 The Stables, Perth, PH1 2TW, a place he often visited. After days of searching, and fearing a possible sea kayaking accident, he was eventually located in the vicinity of his grandfather Ricky Williams' retirement community. Staff at Lundy Gardens, Fort William, PH33 6PD, traced his whereabouts, ensuring his safety.
